title: 1. NFTs on Optimism - OptiPunks, public goods funding, market conditions ft. Jrocki.eth and Bodo
body:
PILOT EPISODE - 1st Weekly Twitter Space covering the Optimism NFT ecosystem: OptiPunks, Public Goods Funding, and more.

\*\*Collect and own this episode as an NFT!

* 0.0025 ETH mint, limited collection of 10 NFTs.
* Proceeds are re-invested to grow the podcast and expand crypto education.

## Listen to the Recording:

[https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/1-nfts-on-optimism-optipunks-public-goods-funding-market/id1626927963?i=1000564612640](https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/1-nfts-on-optimism-optipunks-public-goods-funding-market/id1626927963?i=1000564612640)

[https://open.spotify.com/episode/6KzVFpIoxUNoyABQNpwopM](https://open.spotify.com/episode/6KzVFpIoxUNoyABQNpwopM)

**Overview: NFT Projects on Optimism:**

* Optipunks: original NFT on optimism. 100% of mint went to public goods funding. 50% of secondary went to public goods. Royalties on secondary is 2.5%...
* the OptiPunks community voted to decide which project funds would go towards.
* Optimistic Apes: Another project available on Quixotic... Sounded like a lot of us on the call minted or purchased some. The artist is still a mystery!
* Circular art, generative art platform designed to fund public goods

**What are public goods?**

* Examples of public goods include libraries, roads, open-source software (like ether.js).
* Paid for by the community (funded thru taxes, for example)
* Benefit everyone using the ecosystem.
* "retroactive public goods funding" - if people did something positive, community can vote to allocate money / rewards for building useful things.
* Public goods solve the market inequality of positive externalities.

*Join us every Monday at 4pm PST / 7pm EST on Twitter. Hosted by Jrocki (@Reformed_Normie) and Espresso (@Espressoinsight).*

title: 2. Quixotic NFT Marketplace, OptiPunk Giveaway, Dapps, IPFS, Warpspeed Bridge
body:
2nd Weekly Twitter Space covering the Optimism Ecosystem: Quixotic NFT marketplace, Dapps, and more.

\*\*Collect and own this episode as an NFT!

* 0.005 ETH mint, limited collection of 10 NFTs.
* Proceeds are re-invested to grow the podcast and expand crypto education.

## Listen to the Recording:

[https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/2-quixotic-nft-marketplace-optimistic-ape-giveaway/id1626927963?i=1000564612420](https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/2-quixotic-nft-marketplace-optimistic-ape-giveaway/id1626927963?i=1000564612420)

[https://open.spotify.com/episode/2CVmRgSrvxXNvfyXlPsYp5](https://open.spotify.com/episode/2CVmRgSrvxXNvfyXlPsYp5)

*Crypto is how you program money. Money is how you program people.*

## Why would a developer want to build on Optimism?

The answer is incentives.

"Incentives motivate behavior."

The ecosystem needs developers to actually BUILD DAPPS on Optimism.

Why should a developer want to use Optimism as opposed to any other blockchain network?

Incentives to build on Optimism: the â€œOptimism Governance Fundâ€ donates money to teams and projects that have built useful things for the community.

These useful projects are known as â€œpublic goodsâ€.

The idea here is to reward those that contribute in positive ways.. incentivizing new developers to launch their dapps on Optimism.

* Public Goods make people want to join an ecosystem. Science is and example of a public good that is valuable to society.
* With retroactive public goods, whatever turns out to be the most valuable tends to be retroactively rewarded after proving its product-market fit. This is the opposite of traditional venture capital firms that go out to fund a bunch of different ideas without knowing for sure what will succeed.

## Why Did You Get into into Optimism Ecosystem??

\*\*\*jrocki.eth \*\*\*- Twitter Spaces Co-host. supported Optimism during OptiPunks launch because of Public Goods Funding Infrastructure.

***Mark, Co-Founder of Quixotic.io:***

Mark was a software engineer at an ad-tech company. Later learned about ETH, Optimism, and the possibility to host projects on IPFS.

* Participated in ETH global hackathon in 2021â€¦ involved with Feudals Ethereum communityâ€¦ worked on some various developments in Ethereum.
* Looked at other Layer 1â€™s, saw the high cost of trading NFTs on L2. Saw Layer 2â€™s as the future. Wanted to build something and make something happen in the space.
* Build / launch Quixotic.io
* Currently building CryptoVania / Storyverse on IPFS

## On Building + Dapps in the Optimistic Rollup space:

Even though the markets are down it feels like the builders are full-steam ahead.

On the Space, Mark raised the question: what do users need for adoption to increase?

**One specific need** was brought up: we need a decentralized app store / decentralized app platform.

* For example, you donâ€™t see substack app on the App Store. Why not? Because App Stores take too big of a cut due to policies around in app purchases etc. Effectively creates a roughly 30% markup on everything.
* Browser apps are harder to block and shut down, however, performance and computation are more difficult in browser.
* Huge opportunity for decentralized apps.

**IPFS** - communication and naming protocol. Similar to bittorrent, everyone can access files on IPFS thru peer to peer network.

* With Brave Browser you can visit IPFS, similar to using http.
* If no one is pinning the file, it might be really slow. So, you can pay someone in Filecoin or Pinata to pay the network to access the file, if no one pins it.

**Warp speed bridge** - standard protocol level bridge for optimismâ€¦Eth in escrow / burns the eth etc. Came out of a project called teleportal.

**Storj** - startup for decentralized storage. They encrypt your file.. many copies of the data in little chunks. Users of dropbox could move to something like this - around $7 per month for $1 TB.

title: The Proposal
body:
For those who want to read the actual proposal and all its details, you can do so [here](https://nouns.wtf/vote/107). TLDR, prop 107 was a proposal for Nouns to participate in Verseâ€™s most recent equity round, in which Nouns would fund 175 ETH in exchange for a proportionate amount of equity in Verse Labs, the company building the Verse protocol. The twist is that the majority of the funds would be specifically earmarked to buy a Noun (ideally via auction as to return ETH directly back to the Nouns treasury), thus theoretically aligning Verse & Nouns long-term.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/UDE0SKD2qZaDb7RSt9ayj.jpg?height=1200&width=2000)

A couple weeks ago, I put the [idea](https://discourse.nouns.wtf/t/nounsdao-investment-in-verse/1607/11) for this proposal on Nouns Discourse. Overall, the feedback received was mostly positive. There were some concerns about legal compliance (will talk more about this later), but overall, there seemed to be enthusiasm for the proposal. Thus, I proceeded to put the proposal on-chain.

title: On-chain reaction
body:
After putting the proposal on-chain, discussion heated up significantly. From my perspective, there were spirited debates in the Nouns Discord channels & Telegram groups about certain core issues:

1. â€œWhat legal + compliance hurdles would an equity investment place on the DAO?â€

   This was the first equity investment proposed to the DAO, and I knew that figuring out a legal structure would be a challenge since the DAO doesnâ€™t have a legal entity aside from the one-way Nouns Foundation.
2. â€œWhat precedent would it set if we started doing equity deals?â€

   Iâ€™ll comment on this a bit more later.
3. â€œWhy is Verse a good fit to be supported by Nouns"?â€

   This was the question most pertinent to the actual content of the proposal (as opposed to the logistical structure). Opinions here of course vary among different people in the DAO, but I left my personal thoughts in the Discourse post above.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/XSbtwhSDtmWypMrhrKstw.jpg?height=1080&width=1920)

These are all valid questions that deserve deep consideration. However, personally, I was a bit disappointed that significant pushback only came after the proposal went on-chain and became immutable. Based on the initial positive Discourse reaction, I had no idea that these questions (specifically #1 & #2) would be such heavy blockers that would cause most voters to either abstain or not vote at all. Structurally, I do think itâ€™s a flaw that the DAO isnâ€™t able to effectively counter proposals or make suggested amendments after a prop goes on-chain. Above all, it was just frustrating that the critical feedback came far too late to make any meaningful changes.

title: Folks - a genesis collection
body:
## What is â€˜Folksâ€™?

A growing group of collections of 1/1 photographs captured over the last 10 years across New York, the western US, Israel and more.

The first set of 16 photographs were all captured on film - mostly Kodak Tri-X 400 but some Ektar 100 color film and disposable color film.

## Who am I?

Iâ€™m a New York-native photographer and filmmaker. Iâ€™ve spent 10+ years taking street photos in New York and other locations.

## How much do the NFTs cost?

The first 16 images will be priced at 1 ETH reserve, and can range higher based on the image

## Prints

I will offer print, framing and shipping service **at cost** for anyone who wants to redeem.

### How to redeem prints?

[See this page for more info](https://mirror.xyz/dashboard/edit/15KP24PVDAhfLqZ4ud4rs2O6WJZmZPO9JRKhdvbJqvM)

## Future plans

Iâ€™m exploring on-chain auctioning technology, which will allow anyone to place on-chain bids for additional works

## Where can I buy the NFTs?

[Rarible](https://rarible.com/folks-genesis/)

[LooksRare](https://looksrare.org/collections/0x39aF36141859B6faa99Aa566601159De3AcD1804)

title: How 'over-financialisation' of crypto lead to the rise and fall of the industry. And how we can build it back again...
body:
As a long time evangelist and supporter of blockchain technology and various crypto projects, I have a confession to make. Over the years, I have grown a certain level of â€˜dislikeâ€™ for Bitcoin. The problem is, I donâ€™t actually find it very useful at all. That being said, I must give it credit where it is due - the boom of Bitcoin provided a meaningful experiment that validated the secure nature of blockchains.

Now time for confession twoâ€¦. While I am fan, Ethereum isnâ€™t really that useful either. Sure, we can build complex applications on-top of blockchains but unfortunately those applications are bound to the restrictions of a blockchain environment and are unable to communicate with any meaningful data other than what the Ethereum protocol provides out of the box.

Cueâ€¦ DeFi

* Decentralised liquidity provision
* Decentralised lending protocols
* Tokenised, immutable in-game assets

While I do think that these areÂ innovative financial products, they are largely built on top of tokens that are mostly backed by questionable value. They missing one key element that makes them actually valuable. External data.

Without the ability to reference external data in a trustless manner, blockchain technology is incapable of facilitating any kind of useful transaction that impacts the real world. This is the difference between â€œmoney legosâ€ and â€œmoney Jengaâ€.

With that all said, I should be clear that I am still extremely bullish on crypto technologies.

I see the current state of crypto is similar to the state of computing in the 80â€™s (coming from a zoomerâ€¦). I say this because pre-1993, the internet was not yet popularised. Computers did not have the ability to seamlessly connect and share information with other devices. AKA; the ability to connect to external data.

I strongly believe that blockchain technology running in parallel with a standardised oracle network (likely Chainlink) to fetch and validate external data is a recipe to disrupt global financial industry at scale.

This â€˜magic recipeâ€™ provides cost savings for corporations globally by applying automation to highly sensitive and trust heavy industries that would otherwise require expensive auditing and risk/security control.

* Insurance
* Trusted automated banking infrastructure
* Transparency to FED data
* Trust minimised enterprise systems
* Supply chain; RFID tracking, IOT sensors
* E-signatures
* Identity protocols
* Biometrics data

The next magic internet money printing machine will not survive. Letâ€™s build positive-sum applications that offer a product/service that generates value for BOTH users AND investors - because Chainlink makes this possible.

I knowâ€¦ crazy idea right?

If youâ€™re building something truely useful in the blockchain ecosystem, I would love to hear your story and learn about your product. Donâ€™t be afraid to reach out to me on Twitter or Telegram @fintechfin

title: Folks - a genesis collection
body:
## What is â€˜Folksâ€™?

A growing group of collections of 1/1 photographs captured over the last 10 years across New York, the western US, Israel and more.

The first set of 16 photographs were all captured on film - mostly Kodak Tri-X 400 but some Ektar 100 color film and disposable color film.

## Who am I?

Iâ€™m a New York-native photographer and filmmaker. Iâ€™ve spent 10+ years taking street photos in New York and other locations.

## How much do the NFTs cost?

The first 16 images will be priced at 1 ETH reserve, and can range higher based on the image

## Prints

I will offer print, framing and shipping service **at cost** for anyone who wants to redeem.

### How to redeem prints?

[See this page for more info](https://mirror.xyz/dashboard/edit/15KP24PVDAhfLqZ4ud4rs2O6WJZmZPO9JRKhdvbJqvM)

## Future plans

Iâ€™m exploring on-chain auctioning technology, which will allow anyone to place on-chain bids for additional works

## Where can I buy the NFTs?

[Rarible](https://rarible.com/folks-genesis/)

[LooksRare](https://looksrare.org/collections/0x39aF36141859B6faa99Aa566601159De3AcD1804)

title: Mint information, Community, And the start of an era. ğŸ§™
body:
Firstly, thank you all for the amazing support for the upcoming Mint.

The amazing fan art, heart-wrenching stories and all the funny memes you have sent us have truly humbled us!

We wanted to be transparent and keep you all updated before our official launch, so here is a small blog post about our upcoming Mint!:

Community is one of our core philosophies, and we would be nowhere without everyone's support, so listening to feedback is always the number priority.

So after hearing a lot of complaints and worrisome messages about the overallocation, and how it brings additional stress and gas wars, we have concluded that we will change our Mint allocation!

We had originally decided upon a 20% overallocation to guarantee a Mint-out of the WL and to account for the industry average of 25% no-shows.

However, as the community, you have made it very clear to us that you want to Mint, and we expect the no-show quota to be far less than originally anticipated!

So seeing your loyal support and the great community we were able to build so far, we felt that it was unfair to have such a high overallocation and have thus decided to lower the overallocation!

After consulting with our advisors and the gracious support of our collab partners, who were willing to sacrifice their originally intended allowance, we have increased the total WL supply by an additional 12.51% to reward our early supporters!

Our new WL supply will beÂ **5000**, and our new WL overallocation will only beÂ **7.49% !**

Despite the new overallocation rate, we canâ€™t guarantee everyone to be able to Mint a wizard, and we suggest all summoners Mint their Wizard as soon as possible, so to not miss out!

The Mint will take place exclusively on [www.wickedwizard.wtf](http://wickedwizard.wtf/) and public minters will also be able to Mint directly via the smart-contract in addition to the website.

We are over the moon about everyone's support and can't wait for everyone to meet their wizards!

Furthermore we have received feedback that the Mint details were a bit unclear, so we reworked our Mint timeline to showcase a clearer timeline for the Mint!

Below is this reworked, easier-to-view timeline to convey our launch schedule better!

## Revamped Mint Details:

### Phase 1 : Whitelist Mint âœ¨

5000 Supply

Mint Price = Free

Allocation: 1x WL

Date: 15th of July 1PM UTC - 4PM UTC

See the time in your local timezone: 

[https://24timezones.com/event?txt=Wicked%20Wizard%20WL%20Mint%20Countdown%20%F0%9F%A7%99%E2%80%8D%E2%99%80%EF%B8%8F&st=20220715T1300&l=tzutc](https://24timezones.com/event?txt=Wicked%20Wizard%20WL%20Mint%20Countdown%20%F0%9F%A7%99%E2%80%8D%E2%99%80%EF%B8%8F&st=20220715T1300&l=tzutc)

You have three hours to MintğŸª„

### Phase 2: Public Mint ğŸŒ

3888 Supply

Mint Price = \~5.2$ (Jul. 13) aka 0.005 Î

Allocation: 3x per Tx

Date: 15th of July 4PM UTC - 16th of July 4PM UTC

See the time in your local timezone:

[https://24timezones.com/event?txt=Wicked%20Wizard%20Public%20Mint%20Countdown%20%F0%9F%A7%99%E2%80%8D%E2%99%80%EF%B8%8F&st=20220715T1600&l=tzutc](https://24timezones.com/event?txt=Wicked%20Wizard%20Public%20Mint%20Countdown%20%F0%9F%A7%99%E2%80%8D%E2%99%80%EF%B8%8F&st=20220715T1600&l=tzutc)

### Phase 3: Burn ğŸ”¥

The public sale will close in 24H, and all remaining supply will be burned:

This is done to make your Wizard scarce and to bring you value as a holder!

### Phase 4: Reveal ğŸ§™

12H after Mint-out, you will be able to reveal your very own Wizard! ğŸ§™ ğŸª„

title: Funding ideology & Nouns as a neutral ecosystem
body:
Regarding the long-term implications of the DAO undertaking equity investments, a few Nouners made some points which I respect and understand where theyâ€™re coming from. Going down the path of equity funding - as opposed to strictly funding projects without a direct expectation of return - firmly places the DAO in the same territories as VCs and traditional funds. And that path is marked by increased legal liabilities and regulatory scrutiny that could significantly affect the way the DAO operates. To me, these concerns are valid and should be carefully considered.

At the same time, I do want to highlight my disagreements with some other arguments made against this proposal, specifically relating to the ideological values of Nouns.

1. **Contractual equity agreements dilute the nounishness of a proposal**

   I think this argument is orthogonal to the core premise of the Nouns virtuous cycle: drive attention back to the meme. To me, it doesnâ€™t make sense to eschew potential equity partnerships under the pretense that the DAO should never seek direct upside from funding projects. In my opinion, if the goal is to drive attention & value back to the Nouns brand, there shouldnâ€™t be mutual exclusivity between accruing value via brand exposure & accruing value via contractual revenue flow. Both routes increase the size of the treasury and enable the meme to further propagate.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/hyVhFdvvtkqyLdLkPBtpL.jpg?height=1200&width=1920)

1. **Nouns should fund projects which it is uniquely capable of supporting**

   As Nouns grows, the validity of this argument diminishes. If Nouns indeed becomes a massively valuable, permissionless brand, the most ambitious projects which approach the DAO for funding will have no shortage of potential funders who realize the value and are more inclined to fund the project & experience the upside. For example, itâ€™s easy to imagine a scenario where Pharrell approached the DAO about funding a song about Nouns. It wouldnâ€™t make sense for the DAO to walk away from this proposal just because he could also readily get the funds necessary from any sufficiently interested record label.
2. **Nouns should be a neutral ecosystem, and shouldnâ€™t take profit-driven stakes in projects**

   I found this argument to be the strongest and most compelling, because it gets at the heart of Nouns strongly resembling Ethereum itself; a credibly neutral ecosystem in which anyone can build. Itâ€™s not hard to imagine a future where NounsDAO operates similar to the Ethereum foundation, providing grants to projects that build in the ecosystem. Extending this possibility, itâ€™s also not hard to imagine venture funds spinning up Nouns-specific arms - just like many traditional VC funds have done admist the growth of Ethereum - and doing equity deals with companies that are building on top of Nouns.

   At the same time, I do think itâ€™s important to recognize the nuances here. A big part of the Nouns virtuous cycle mechanism is building up the treasury, which continues to accrue funds at a rapid rate. In a world where Nouns becomes more Ethereum-like and turns into more of a public utility than a brand, itâ€™s also likely that many ambitious projects will turn to venture funding over DAO funding, as the former will be cheaper/more readily available to access & will arguably offer the project more tailored resources to succeed. In this case, if the social value of the treasury depreciates, it seems logical that the DAO would want to extend the value of Noun ownership to not only governing the treasury, but governing projects & protocols that are built on top of Nouns. And what is the most straightforward way to gain these governance rights? To become early investors in these projects & protocols, via an equity/token structure. In the long-run, I think itâ€™s inevitable that the DAO seeks more ownership in the projects that are built in the Nouns ecosystem. Iâ€™m not saying that will necessarily come in the form of traditional equity, but itâ€™ll be structured in the form of profit-driven stakes nonetheless.

title: Mint information, Community, And the start of an era. ğŸ§™
body:
Firstly, thank you all for the amazing support for the upcoming Mint.

The amazing fan art, heart-wrenching stories and all the funny memes you have sent us have truly humbled us!

We wanted to be transparent and keep you all updated before our official launch, so here is a small blog post about our upcoming Mint!:

Community is one of our core philosophies, and we would be nowhere without everyone's support, so listening to feedback is always the number one priority.

So after hearing a lot of complaints and worrisome messages about the overallocation, and how it brings additional stress and gas wars, we have concluded that we will change our Mint allocation!

We had originally decided upon a 20% overallocation to guarantee a Mint-out of the WL and to account for the industry average of 25% no-shows.

However, as the community, you have made it very clear to us that you want to Mint, and we expect the no-show quota to be far less than originally anticipated!

So seeing your loyal support and the great community we were able to build so far, we felt that it was unfair to have such a high overallocation and have thus decided to lower the overallocation!

After consulting with our advisors and the gracious support of our collab partners, who were willing to sacrifice their originally intended allowance, we have increased the total WL supply by an additional 12.51% to reward our early supporters!

Our new WL supply will beÂ **5000**, and our new WL overallocation will only beÂ **7.49% !**

Despite the new overallocation rate, we canâ€™t guarantee everyone to be able to Mint a Wizard, and we suggest all summoners Mint their Wizard as soon as possible, so to not miss out!

The Mint will take place exclusively on [www.wickedwizard.wtf](http://wickedwizard.wtf/) and public minters will also be able to Mint directly via the smart-contract in addition to the website.

We are over the moon about everyone's support and can't wait for everyone to meet their wizards!

Furthermore we have received feedback that the Mint details were a bit unclear, so we reworked our Mint timeline to showcase a clearer timeline for the Mint!

Below is this reworked, easier-to-view timeline to convey our launch schedule better!

## Revamped Mint Details:

### Phase 1 : Whitelist Mint âœ¨

5000 Supply

Mint Price = Free

Allocation: 1x WL

Date: 15th of July 1PM UTC - 4PM UTC

See the time in your local timezone:

[https://24timezones.com/event?txt=Wicked%20Wizard%20WL%20Mint%20Countdown%20%F0%9F%A7%99%E2%80%8D%E2%99%80%EF%B8%8F&st=20220715T1300&l=tzutc](https://24timezones.com/event?txt=Wicked%20Wizard%20WL%20Mint%20Countdown%20%F0%9F%A7%99%E2%80%8D%E2%99%80%EF%B8%8F&st=20220715T1300&l=tzutc)

You have three hours to MintğŸª„

### Phase 2: Public Mint ğŸŒ

3888 Supply

Mint Price = \~5.2$ (Jul. 13) aka 0.005 Î

Allocation: 3x per Tx

Date: 15th of July 4PM UTC - 16th of July 4PM UTC

See the time in your local timezone:

[https://24timezones.com/event?txt=Wicked%20Wizard%20Public%20Mint%20Countdown%20%F0%9F%A7%99%E2%80%8D%E2%99%80%EF%B8%8F&st=20220715T1600&l=tzutc](https://24timezones.com/event?txt=Wicked%20Wizard%20Public%20Mint%20Countdown%20%F0%9F%A7%99%E2%80%8D%E2%99%80%EF%B8%8F&st=20220715T1600&l=tzutc)

### Phase 3: Burn ğŸ”¥

The public sale will close in 24H, and all remaining supply will be burned:

This is done to make your Wizard scarce and to bring you value as a holder!

### Phase 4: Reveal ğŸ§™

12H after Mint-out, you will be able to reveal your very own Wizard! ğŸ§™ ğŸª„

title: Mint information, Community, And the start of an era. ğŸ§™
body:
Firstly, thank you all for the amazing support for the upcoming Mint.

The amazing fan art, heart-wrenching stories and all the funny memes you have sent us have truly humbled us!

We wanted to be transparent and keep you all updated before our official launch, so here is a small blog post about our upcoming Mint!:

Community is one of our core philosophies, and we would be nowhere without everyone's support, so listening to feedback is always the number one priority.

So after hearing a lot of complaints and worrisome messages about the overallocation, and how it brings additional stress and gas wars, we have concluded that we will change our Mint allocation!

We had originally decided upon a 20% overallocation to guarantee a Mint-out of the WL and to account for the industry average of 25% no-shows.

However, as the community, you have made it very clear to us that you want to Mint, and we expect the no-show quota to be far less than originally anticipated!

So seeing your loyal support and the great community we were able to build so far, we felt that it was unfair to have such a high overallocation and have thus decided to lower the overallocation!

After consulting with our advisors and the gracious support of our collab partners, who were willing to sacrifice their originally intended allowance, we have increased the total WL supply by an additional 12.51% to reward our early supporters!

Our new WL supply will beÂ **5000**, and our new WL overallocation will only beÂ **7.49% !**

Despite the new overallocation rate, we canâ€™t guarantee everyone to be able to Mint a wizard, and we suggest all summoners Mint their Wizard as soon as possible, so to not miss out!

The Mint will take place exclusively on [www.wickedwizard.wtf](http://wickedwizard.wtf/) and public minters will also be able to Mint directly via the smart-contract in addition to the website.

We are over the moon about everyone's support and can't wait for everyone to meet their wizards!

Furthermore we have received feedback that the Mint details were a bit unclear, so we reworked our Mint timeline to showcase a clearer timeline for the Mint!

Below is this reworked, easier-to-view timeline to convey our launch schedule better!

## Revamped Mint Details:

### Phase 1 : Whitelist Mint âœ¨

5000 Supply

Mint Price = Free

Allocation: 1x WL

Date: 15th of July 1PM UTC - 4PM UTC

See the time in your local timezone:

[https://24timezones.com/event?txt=Wicked%20Wizard%20WL%20Mint%20Countdown%20%F0%9F%A7%99%E2%80%8D%E2%99%80%EF%B8%8F&st=20220715T1300&l=tzutc](https://24timezones.com/event?txt=Wicked%20Wizard%20WL%20Mint%20Countdown%20%F0%9F%A7%99%E2%80%8D%E2%99%80%EF%B8%8F&st=20220715T1300&l=tzutc)

You have three hours to MintğŸª„

### Phase 2: Public Mint ğŸŒ

3888 Supply

Mint Price = \~5.2$ (Jul. 13) aka 0.005 Î

Allocation: 3x per Tx

Date: 15th of July 4PM UTC - 16th of July 4PM UTC

See the time in your local timezone:

[https://24timezones.com/event?txt=Wicked%20Wizard%20Public%20Mint%20Countdown%20%F0%9F%A7%99%E2%80%8D%E2%99%80%EF%B8%8F&st=20220715T1600&l=tzutc](https://24timezones.com/event?txt=Wicked%20Wizard%20Public%20Mint%20Countdown%20%F0%9F%A7%99%E2%80%8D%E2%99%80%EF%B8%8F&st=20220715T1600&l=tzutc)

### Phase 3: Burn ğŸ”¥

The public sale will close in 24H, and all remaining supply will be burned:

This is done to make your Wizard scarce and to bring you value as a holder!

### Phase 4: Reveal ğŸ§™

12H after Mint-out, you will be able to reveal your very own Wizard! ğŸ§™ ğŸª„

title: Mint information, Community, And the start of an era. ğŸ§™
body:
Firstly, thank you all for the amazing support for the upcoming Mint.

The amazing fan art, heart-wrenching stories and all the funny memes you have sent us have truly humbled us!

We wanted to be transparent and keep you all updated before our official launch, so here is a small blog post about our upcoming Mint!:

Community is one of our core philosophies, and we would be nowhere without everyone's support, so listening to feedback is always the number one priority.

So after hearing a lot of complaints and worrisome messages about the overallocation, and how it brings additional stress and gas wars, we have concluded that we will change our Mint allocation!

We had originally decided upon a 20% overallocation to guarantee a Mint-out of the WL and to account for the industry average of 25% no-shows.

However, as the community, you have made it very clear to us that you want to Mint, and we expect the no-show quota to be far less than originally anticipated!

So seeing your loyal support and the great community we were able to build so far, we felt that it was unfair to have such a high overallocation and have thus decided to lower the overallocation!

After consulting with our advisors and the gracious support of our collab partners, who were willing to sacrifice their originally intended allowance, we have increased the total WL supply by an additional 12.51% to reward our early supporters!

Our new WL supply will beÂ **5000**, and our new WL overallocation will only beÂ **7.49% !**

Despite the new overallocation rate, we canâ€™t guarantee everyone to be able to Mint a Wizard, and we suggest all summoners Mint their Wizard as soon as possible, so to not miss out!

The Mint will take place exclusively on [www.wickedwizard.wtf](http://wickedwizard.wtf/) and public minters will also be able to Mint directly via the smart-contract in addition to the website.

We are over the moon about everyone's support and can't wait for everyone to meet their Wizards!

Furthermore we have received feedback that the Mint details were a bit unclear, so we reworked our Mint timeline to showcase a clearer timeline for the Mint!

Below is this reworked, easier-to-view timeline to convey our launch schedule better!

## Revamped Mint Details:

### Phase 1 : Whitelist Mint âœ¨

5000 Supply

Mint Price = Free

Allocation: 1x WL

Date: 15th of July 1PM UTC - 4PM UTC

See the time in your local timezone:

[https://24timezones.com/event?txt=Wicked%20Wizard%20WL%20Mint%20Countdown%20%F0%9F%A7%99%E2%80%8D%E2%99%80%EF%B8%8F&st=20220715T1300&l=tzutc](https://24timezones.com/event?txt=Wicked%20Wizard%20WL%20Mint%20Countdown%20%F0%9F%A7%99%E2%80%8D%E2%99%80%EF%B8%8F&st=20220715T1300&l=tzutc)

You have three hours to MintğŸª„

### Phase 2: Public Mint ğŸŒ

3888 Supply

Mint Price = \~5.2$ (Jul. 13) aka 0.005 Î

Allocation: 3x per Tx

Date: 15th of July 4PM UTC - 16th of July 4PM UTC

See the time in your local timezone:

[https://24timezones.com/event?txt=Wicked%20Wizard%20Public%20Mint%20Countdown%20%F0%9F%A7%99%E2%80%8D%E2%99%80%EF%B8%8F&st=20220715T1600&l=tzutc](https://24timezones.com/event?txt=Wicked%20Wizard%20Public%20Mint%20Countdown%20%F0%9F%A7%99%E2%80%8D%E2%99%80%EF%B8%8F&st=20220715T1600&l=tzutc)

### Phase 3: Burn ğŸ”¥

The public sale will close in 24H, and all remaining supply will be burned:

This is done to make your Wizard scarce and to bring you value as a holder!

### Phase 4: Reveal ğŸ§™

12H after Mint-out, you will be able to reveal your very own Wizard! ğŸ§™ ğŸª„

title: Closing Thoughts
body:
Obviously, Iâ€™m disappointed that Prop 107 didnâ€™t pass. I think itâ€™s unfortunate that the proposal had such low turnout and I think many of the uncertainties could have been worked out/ameliorated had more discussion taken place before the proposal went on-chain. However, I firmly respect the outcome, as it was the result of a perfectly 

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/rtsgbVRzEZDsGYjM1ODTA.jpg?height=1200&width=1920)

[legitimate](https://vitalik.ca/general/2021/03/23/legitimacy.html) process. I want to thank many of the Nouners and Nounders who did offer very helpful feedback throughout this process. Even though I donâ€™t agree with all the points that were made, I think this was a very valuable learning experience and forcing function that pushed the DAO to think hard about long-term ownership. I look forward to continue being active in the Nouns community, and releasing a special Nounish project on Verse V2 very soon ;)

title: Konami Reinstating Delisted Metal Gear Games For Series' 35th Anniversary
body:
Konami is preparing to reinstate the Metal Gear games it temporarily removed from sale as the series celebrates its 35th anniversary.

As reported by [VGC](https://www.videogameschronicle.com/news/on-metal-gears-35th-anniversary-konami-says-its-preparing-to-bring-back-delisted-games/), Konami's Japanese Twitter account posted to commemorate the anniversary and announced that fans, seemingly soon, will once again be able to play [the temporarily suspended entries](https://www.ign.com/articles/metal-gear-solid-games-removed-from-sale-temporary).

"The Metal Gear series, released on July 13, 1987, celebrated its 35th anniversary today," it said. "We are preparing to resume sales of titles that have been temporarily suspended."

This could refer to the versions of Metal Gear Solid 2 and 3 that were removed from digital storefronts last November following license renewal issues.

title: 2022 Disney Accelerator
body:
Today, The Walt Disney Company announced the six companies that will be joining the 2022 Disney Accelerator, a business development program designed to accelerate the growth of innovative companies from around the world. This yearâ€™s Disney Accelerator class is focused on building the future of immersive experiences and specializes in technologies such as augmented reality (AR), non-fungible tokens (NFTs), and artificial intelligence (AI) characters.

The Disney Accelerator kicks off this week, connecting the 2022 class with the creativity, imagination, and expertise of Disney. Over the course of the program, each participant company will receive guidance from Disneyâ€™s senior leadership team, as well as a dedicated executive mentor. The Disney Accelerator program will conclude with a Demo Day in the fall at the Walt Disney Studios lot in Burbank, Calif.

title: By Mike Memoli
body:
ormer Vice President Joe Biden said Thursday that he would not pardon President Donald Trump if elected and insisted any prosecutorial decisions would be left to a more independent Justice Department.

Answering questions in a virtual town hall-style event on MSNBC Thursday, the Democratic presidential hopeful was asked by a voter about whether heâ€™d follow the lead of former President Gerald Ford, who pardoned Richard Nixon in large part to help the nation move beyond the Watergate scandal.

title: Executing on our long-term vision
body:
n the two years leading up to this milestone, weâ€™ve celebrated some incredible moments along the wayâ€¦

* December 2019: [Launched Checkov](https://bridgecrew.io/blog/announcing-checkov-prevent-cloud-misconfigurations-during-build-time/), our open-source IaC scanner with initial support for Terraform
* April 2020: [Came out of stealth](https://bridgecrew.io/blog/the-crew-is-out-of-stealth/), releasing our codified cloud security platform and [ten+ ecosystem integrations](https://bridgecrew.io/blog/developer-first-integrations-codified-cloud-security-platform-launch/)
* April 2020: [Open-sourced AirIAM](https://bridgecrew.io/blog/airiam-open-source-aws-iam-terraform-right-size-launch/), our IAM right-sizing tool for AWS
* May 2020: Built [TerraGoat](https://bridgecrew.io/blog/terragoat-open-source-infrastructure-code-security-training-project-terraform/), our vulnerable-by-design training tool for Terraform, later followed by [CfnGoat](https://bridgecrew.io/blog/introducing-cfngoat-a-vulnerable-by-design-cloudformation-training-tool/) and [CDKGoat](https://github.com/bridgecrewio/cdkgoat)
* July 2020: Checkov [passed 1k stars on GitHub](https://twitter.com/bridgecrewio/status/1282717861195034624?s=20) (it now has over 2k)
* December 2020: [Launched Code Reviews](https://bridgecrew.io/blog/code-reviews-actionable-iac-security-feedback/) feature to provide relevant changes on commits and CI/CD runs
* February 2021: [Entered agreement to be acquired by Palo Alto Networks](https://bridgecrew.io/blog/palo-alto-networks-announces-intent-to-acquire-bridgecrew/) as part of Prisma Cloud

Each of these moments and everything in between has contributed to our success. And in many ways, todayâ€™s milestone is simply another along our continued journey.Â By [becoming part of Palo Alto Networksâ€™ Prisma Cloud](https://blog.paloaltonetworks.com/2021/03/bridgecrew-developer-led-security/), we get to continue bridging the gap between developers and cloud security. **This is what this acquisition means for our open-source community, the Bridgecrew platform, and the cloud security ecosystem at large.**

Tl;dr:

* Checkov is not only here to stay but will benefit from even more resources to expand the depth and breadth of its coverage.
* We will continue investing in our other open-source projects like our vulnerable-by-design training tools and AirIAM. We also have some exciting new open-source projects in the works to solve other infrastructure development challenges. (Subscribe to our blog ğŸ‘‰Â  for updates)
* We will double-down on adding features, integrations, and improvements to the Bridgecrew platform.
* Soon, Bridgecrew customers will benefit from many code and cloud security features available in Prisma Cloud.
* Together, Bridgecrew and Prisma Cloud will be the first to secure the entire cloud-native development lifecycle for security and engineering teams alike.

## Doubling-down on support for the community

[Checkov](https://checkov.io/) has been downloaded over 1.2M times and has received over 2,000 stars on GitHub. When we open-sourced Checkov just over a year ago, we only had an inkling that the need for it was so great and that the response would be so resounding.

We are keeping the commitment we made thenâ€”to make IaC scanning easy and accessible to all. With the help of the communityâ€™s feedback and contributions, weâ€™ve learned that to do so, it needs to be comprehensive in both breadth and depth. That means more built-in checks across more supported frameworks. It also means going deeper into the areas we already support and making the feedback even more valuable.

We take great pride in our open-source commitment and will continue developing our existing projects with exciting plans for new ones.

* We open-sourced AirIAM after identifying access and identity as the ultimate trust boundary being disrupted by IaC. AirIAM creates an immutable snapshot of IAM directories and creates rightsized instances of them. We look forward to introducing additional Terraforming and rightsizing capabilities in the coming months to continue elevating free and accessible IAM security.
* We were inspired by previous â€œvulnerable-by-designâ€ projects to help developers experience what misconfigured infrastructure looks like without compromising their existing apps. We remain committed to helping DevOps leaders educate the broader developer ecosystem on the risks of human error in cloud infrastructure.
* We are in the final phases of development of a new automated infrastructure tagging tool. (If youâ€™d like to hear more about it and participate in an early private beta, drop me a line.)

## Bringing developer-first cloud security to all with Bridgecrew

Launched less than a year ago, the [Bridgecrew SaaS platform](https://bridgecrew.io/platform) combines IaC scanning powered by Checkov with runtime security capabilities.Â We decided early on to make surfaced feedback actionable and accessible in the form of security-as-code fixes, available in our free Community plan. We will continue to offer our free Community plan and accessible pricing options.Â 

Our bread-and-butter is surfacing misconfigurations in IaC as part of pre-commit hooks, code reviews, and CI/CD runs.Â While IaC continues to be a core focus, our customers will still have complete access to our runtime scanning and automated remediations. This capability is crucial to bridge the divide between code and cloud. It enables us to cover core cloud security use cases like drift detection, blast radius estimation, and more.

One of the things weâ€™re most excited about is the ability to quickly integrate features that are less core to our focus on infrastructure and IaC. As part of the Prisma Cloud family, we get to tap into the marketâ€™s leading cloud security solution. Many of its capabilities, like static code analysis and vulnerability scanning in Docker images, will be added to the Bridgecrew platform over time. This is a huge benefit to teams using the Bridgecrew platform to shift cloud security left.Â 

## Executing on our long-term vision

Ultimately, we are thrilled at the prospect of developing the first end-to-end security platform for both developers and security teams that covers the entire application lifecycle.Â 

With our focus on IaC and the developer experience, along with [Prismaâ€™s incredibly robust cloud native security platform (CNSP) capabilities](https://www.paloaltonetworks.com/prisma/cloud), weâ€™re excited about what we can achieve together.Â 

When combined, our complementary technologies and approaches will disrupt how teams have addressed cloud and application security. Together we look forward to securing our digital lives and saving teams valuable time and resources along the way.Â 

As the legendary Vulcan philosopher Surak said, â€œMay we together become greater than the sum of both of us.â€Â 

## Â· Â· Â·

To learn more about what the acquisition means for us, [ask us anything in our Reddit AMA](https://www.reddit.com/r/AMA/) Thursday 3/4 at 8 am PT. Bridgecrew co-founder and CEO Idan Tendler is also joining Varun Badhwar, SVP Products & Engineering, Prisma Cloud, [for a Fireside Chat on 3/8](https://www.twitch.tv/bridgecrewio/schedule)!

title: A Retro Memoir from Steam Gamers Back in 2003
body:
During the past week, P12 reached multiple milestones in the **Genesis Airdrop Event**. But without the support of our beloved gamers and developers, we would never have come this far.

**We reached out to some gamers ranked within the top 50, hoping to do a short interview about their gaming history.** We are lucky and honored to have some kind response from our interviewees. We are here to share it:


---

## Intro

Today's content came from 3 Chinese steam gamers, all ranked in the top 50 among all 500k users verified on the P12 platform. China is a large gamer community with over 30 million steam users and 380+ local games published.


---

## The Origins

We started the interview by asking ***"How did you got into steam, what was the first game you played on steam?"***.

Surprisingly, we received 3 similar answers from the interviewees. ***"It was because of Counter-Strike 1.6"***.

> *"I started playing back in CS 1.3, I did not even know Steam was a gaming platform back then. All I knew was if I wanted to play CS 1.6, I would have to download and register on Steam."*
>
> From: GT_Marksman

Other interviewees shared the same information. Their initial contact with Steam was because of *Counter-Strike: 1.6*. They all remained loyal players of *Counter-Strike: Global Offensive* ever since it came online in August 2012.


---

## The Favourite

As we all know, most gamers are wide open to trying any type of game, especially in the early stage of their gaming history. Our interviewees were no different, they were the **early pioneers of many timeless classics**:

> *"I tried many other games as well, like Dota and Dota 2, I played them for many years. But ever since my gamer friends got busy dealing with life and marriage, we stopped spending too much time on those games. In my current stage of life, 10 minutes death match in CS:GO is probably the only thing that works for me, I get to enjoy, without devoting too much time."*
>
> From: GT_Marksman

> *"My favorite game type is FPS game, but I also play a lot of MMORPG and ARPG. I would say Worldofwarcraft is my second favorite game, I devoted a lot of time to it."*
>
> From: VortX


---

## From web2 to web3

Many gamers heard about ***gamefi*** and ***web3***, more or less. Same with our interviewees, all three of them knew gamefi to some degree, and some even hold a crypto investment portfolio.

***"So how much do they know about web3 and gamefi, representing first-gen gamers, do they have any advice for P12?"***

> *â€œI actually do know about blockchain, matter of fact: my crypto portfolio is in a net loss right nowâ€¦ I really hope web3 and gamefi can focus on the nature of play rather than earning. Blockchain technology should only be implemented when we have matured and quality game in place. Fun-to-play is really a must, players have to be willing to spend, before they all think about how to earn. Otherwise, a death spiral is inevitable.â€*
>
> From: GT_Marksman

> *â€œI had heard about â€˜Play-2-Earnâ€™ before, and I did try some. However, it was a really bad experience for me as a web2 gamer... For me, web3 or p2e games are not fun at all, including but not limited to the visual effects/network stability/interactive play. I don't really think true gamers will play these games, at least not for now.â€*
>
> From: iang X

It is obvious that **web3 games need some major make-over in order to get web2 audience**.


---

## The expectation

P12 values users' feedback. We definitely love taking suggestions and expectations as well.

The conversation, therefore, goes to the next topic: ***"What types of games you'd like to see on the P12 platform in the future?"***

> *My personal preference would be FPS games with MMO traits. Like â€˜The Divisionâ€™ or â€˜Destiny 2â€™, where gamers can participate in the design of DLC and spend time treasure hunting. In my opinion, this will better attract â€˜p2eâ€˜ players in the web2 space.*
>
> From: VortX


---

## Wrapping-up

Our interviewees today represent the first generation of Steam gamers back in 2003, who should already be in a later stage of life where work, family, and obligation kick in.

Loss of time, busy at work and family. Gamers in that era may not enjoy gaming like they used to, but **the spirits live on, and they will still love gaming just like on day 1**.

To all our gamers out there, when was the last time you were "**Online**"?

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/Z5VY9ovlUqATmQhVpfm1P.png?height=186&width=681)

title: The Morning After: First impressions of Nothingâ€™s see-through smartphone
body:
With its transparent back, light-up details and low-fi ringtones, the [Nothing Phone 1](https://www.engadget.com/nothing-phone-1-hands-on-first-impressions-availability-pricing-153035083.html) is framed as a playful reinterpretation of the smartphone, a category that (beside foldables) has become staid.

[Engadget](https://www.engadget.com/nothing-phone-1-hands-on-first-impressions-availability-pricing-153035083.html)

Itâ€™s an anticipated addition to the world of smartphones, and Nothing would do well to carve out a place for itself against not only the dominant Apple and Samsung, but an array of Chinese manufacturers with a lot of industrial might â€” and funding.

I wanted to hate Nothingâ€™s first phone, which has gone hard on detail drip feeding, glamor shots and an awful lot of hyperbole. But my early impressions (Iâ€™m in the midst of reviewing the Phone 1 right now) are that, behind all that noise, thereâ€™s a surprisingly decent smartphone here.

In iPadOS 15, students can even customise text size settings on an app-by-app basis. Go â€º Background Sounds. Minimise distractions to help students focus by playing calming sounds â€” such as ocean or rain â€” to mask unwanted environmental noise. Go â€º Focus. Help students concentrate on a task. Focus can silence all notifications on iPad to keep distractions to a minimum. Go â€º Live Text and Visual Look Up. With Live Text, students can copy and share text in a photo, translate languages or open a website. And Visual Look Up allows them to identify and share information in a photo, such as popular landmarks, art or plants. Go â€º Voice Control. Voice Control allows students to navigate and interact with iPad using their voice to tap, swipe, type and more. Go â€º Type to Siri. Type instead of speaking to Siri on iPad. title: something youâ€™d like
body:
**TLDR: Mad Realities is reimagining entertainment for the modern world - focusing on shared experience, co-creation and ownership. A membership pass is your key to the first decentralized entertainment platform, starting with the worldâ€™s first interactive web3 dating show Proof of Love ğŸ’—**

Buying a Mad Realities Genenis Membership Pass gives you:

* A lifetime basic membership to all things Mad Realities (and access to exclusive community).
* Voting (Y/N) on our cast: both bachelors and contestants.
* Ability to interact in real-time with the show: live chat, elimination, showing support (saving contestants), speculating on weekly outcomes, and more.
* Eligibility to win 1-of-1 commemorative NFTs throughout the season for interaction.
* Exclusive in-person events.

If this sounds interesting to you, or something youâ€™d like to be a part of, read on.

title: Elon Musk's $44 billion
body: Elon Musk's $44 billion deal to acquire Twitter may have been pulled off the table, but the social media company is taking legal action against the billionaire CEO of Tesla. In an effort to demonstrate Musk's "disparaging" behavior toward the company, Twitter has submitted a poop emoji reply tweet Musk sent to CEO Parag Agrawal's tweet thread about how bot percentages are calculated. Just when you thought this story couldn't get any dumber, a poop emoji tweet is being used as evidence in a lawsuit. We are truly in the dumbest timeline.

title: dilute the nounishness of a proposal
body:
Nouners made some points which I respect and understand where theyâ€™re coming from. Going down the path of equity funding - as opposed to strictly funding projects without a direct expectation of return - firmly places the DAO in the same territories as VCs and traditional funds. And that path is marked by increased legal liabilities and regulatory scrutiny that could significantly affect the way the DAO operates. To me, these concerns are valid and should be carefully considered.

At the same time, I do want to highlight my disagreements with some other arguments made against this proposal, specifically relating to the ideological values of Nouns.

1. **Contractual equity agreements dilute the nounishness of a proposal**

   I think this argument is orthogonal to the core premise of the Nouns virtuous cycle: drive attention back to the meme. To me, it doesnâ€™t make sense to eschew potential equity partnerships under the pretense that the DAO should never seek direct upside from funding projects. In my opinion, if the goal is to drive attention & value back to the Nouns brand, there shouldnâ€™t be mutual exclusivity between accruing value via brand exposure & accruing value via contractual revenue flow. Both routes increase the size of the treasury and enable the meme to further propagate.
2. **Nouns should fund projects which it is uniquely capable of supporting**

   As Nouns grows, the validity of this argument diminishes. If Nouns indeed becomes a massively valuable, permissionless brand, the most ambitious projects which approach the DAO for funding will have no shortage of potential funders who realize the value and are more inclined to fund the project & experience the upside. For example, itâ€™s easy to imagine a scenario where Pharrell approached the DAO about funding a song about Nouns. It wouldnâ€™t make sense for the DAO to walk away from this proposal just because he could also readily get the funds necessary from any sufficiently interested record label.
3. **Nouns should be a neutral ecosystem, and shouldnâ€™t take profit-driven stakes in projects**

   I found this argument to be the strongest and most compelling, because it gets at the heart of Nouns strongly resembling Ethereum itself; a credibly neutral ecosystem in which anyone can build. Itâ€™s not hard to imagine a future where NounsDAO operates similar to the Ethereum foundation, providing grants to projects that build in the ecosystem. Extending this possibility, itâ€™s also not hard to imagine venture funds spinning up Nouns-specific arms - just like many traditional VC funds have done admist the growth of Ethereum - and doing equity deals with companies that are building on top of Nouns.

   At the same time, I do think itâ€™s important to recognize the nuances here. A big part of the Nouns virtuous cycle mechanism is building up the treasury, which continues to accrue funds at a rapid rate. In a world where Nouns becomes more Ethereum-like and turns into more of a public utility than a brand, itâ€™s also likely that many ambitious projects will turn to venture funding over DAO funding, as the former will be cheaper/more readily available to access & will arguably offer the project more tailored resources to succeed. In this case, if the social value of the treasury depreciates, it seems logical that the DAO would want to extend the value of Noun ownership to not only governing the treasury, but governing projects & protocols that are built on top of Nouns. And what is the most straightforward way to gain these governance rights? To become early investors in these projects & protocols, via an equity/token structure. In the long-run, I think itâ€™s inevitable that the DAO seeks more ownership in the projects that are built in the Nouns ecosystem. Iâ€™m not saying that will necessarily come in the form of traditional equity, but itâ€™ll be structured in the form of profit-driven stakes nonetheless.
4. 
5. ### 

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/1XyWg_6_yaZF-9VjBa6oR.jpg?height=1080&width=1920)

### Closing Thoughts

Obviously, Iâ€™m disappointed that Prop 107 didnâ€™t pass. I think itâ€™s unfortunate that the proposal had such low turnout and I think many of the uncertainties could have been worked out/ameliorated had more discussion taken place before the proposal went on-chain. However, I firmly respect the outcome, as it was the result of a perfectly [legitimate](https://vitalik.ca/general/2021/03/23/legitimacy.html) process. I want to thank many of the Nouners and Nounders who did offer very helpful feedback throughout this process. Even though I donâ€™t agree with all the points that were made, I think this was a very valuable learning experience and for

title: Connect Playbook!
body:
Whatâ€™s colorful, jam-packed with data and insights, and ready to be your go-to guide for Twitter campaigns? Itâ€™s the [Connect Playbook](https://business.twitter.com/en/resources/connect-playbook.html)!

There are so many things to consider when planning and running a successful social campaign â€“ enough to fill an entire playbook, in fact. Weâ€™ve compiled our best data, learnings, and tips from our own marketers, customer success specialists, account managers, and creative team to create your one-stop shop for Twitter Ads success.Â 

One of the things that makes Twitter unique is the fact itâ€™s where people come to connect to whatâ€™s happening in the world â€“ theyâ€™re connecting to cultural and topical moments â€“ and to the brands that are taking part in the conversation, too.Â 

This playbook will walk you through what you need to know about using Twitter to connect with cultural moments, target your audience, and deliver results.

title: TikTok announces new ways to filter out mature or 'potentially problematic' videos
body:
TikTok on Wednesday announced several [updates](https://newsroom.tiktok.com/en-us/more-ways-for-our-community-to-enjoy-what-they-love) intended to help users customize their viewing preferences and filter out content that may be problematic or too mature for young users, amid renewed scrutiny of the potential harms social media poses to teens.

The short-form video app is tweaking its viewing experience so users will now see fewer videos about topics that "may be fine as a single video but potentially problematic if viewed repeatedly," according to Cormac Keenan, head of trust and safety at the company. Keenan cited topics related to dieting, extreme fitness, and sadness as examples of such content. (TikTok rival Instagram has also [previously attempted](https://www.cnn.com/2019/09/19/business/instagram-posts-cosmetic-surgery-diet-products-trnd/index.html) to prevent teens from seeing certain weight loss products.)

[An FCC regulator wants TikTok removed from app stores. Here's how a company executive responded](https://edition.cnn.com/2022/07/03/media/tiktok-reliable-sources/index.html)

TikTok also said it is rolling out a new system that organizes content based on thematic maturity, not unlike the ratings systems used in film and television. The new safeguards will allocate a "maturity score" to videos detected as potentially containing mature or complex themes.

* 

The goal, according to Keenan, is "to help prevent content with overtly mature themes from reaching audiences between ages 13-17."

* 

Senators [grilled executives from](https://www.cnn.com/2021/10/26/tech/tiktok-youtube-snap-hearing/index.html) TikTok, YouTube, and Snap late last year about the steps their platforms were taking to protect teens online after a Facebook whistleblower renewed concerns about the impact social media platforms have on their youngest users.

title: Twitter officially
body: Twitter officially sued Musk yesterday in an effort to compel the billionaire to go through with the [$44 billion acquisition](https://www.shacknews.com/article/131278/elon-musk-twitter-twtr-deal-canceled) of the social media company. In its complaint, Twitter has said that Elon Musk broke his non-disparagement obligation to the company. It is pretty obvious how a single poop emoji reply to a very in-depth tweet thread about bot and user data calculations at Twitter could be construed as disparagement, but Musk did go on to reply to his own poop tweet [saying](https://twitter.com/elonmusk/status/1526250477456965634?s=20&t=vdlwnf9kVajqSq5mLp0sCg) "So how do advertisers know what theyâ€™re getting for their money? This is fundamental to the financial health of Twitter."

title: DeHeroGame will start the TT (Technical Test) on July 14
body:
DeHeroGame will be run  TT (Technical Test) on the RangersProtocol mainnet from July 14th to July 28th. 

Before you experience the new gameplay, please take a few minutes to get an overview of what this TT is about:

**About DeHeroGame TT content**

1\. The Technical Test will start at 16:00 on July 14th, 2022 (UTC+8); Test address: <https://rp.dehero.co/>

2\. This test will use the UNIPASS account system, please click here to [view the UNIPASS related introduction](https://mixmarvel.gitbook.io/dehero_game/v/en/)

3\. This Technical Test is a Wipe test. All related assets in the account will be wiped after the test, but the account will be retained. You can use this account to participate in the next test.

4ã€Players can receive the gift package via the address>><https://airdrop.dehero.co/>

![Gift Package](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/dsphhzVOmACp2s7Yf2Czt.png?height=586&width=784)

**Technical Test  content**

1\.Access to Unipass's account system to fully open up the access channel for web2.0 users;

2\.Hero level cap opened to level 90;

3\.The PVE adventure opens to chapter 9;

4\.Added multiple quick battle functions;

5\.Added batch payment to open treasure chest function;

6\.Added shortcut operations such as batch removal skills;

7\.According to user feedback, some problems have been fixed and optimized.

**Technical Test  Event**

During the test period, upgrade cards to meet the following conditions, you can get airdrop rewards when the main network is officially launched. 

Event time: July 14th - July 28th 

Activity content: During the test period, have 5 or more cards and reach the following levels: 

5 or more cards with level 30 - blue game card pack\**1* 

*5 or more cards with level 40 - purple game card pack\**1 

5 or more cards with level 60 - orange game card pack\*1 

Tips: Event rewards will be distributed uniformly when the mainnet is officially launched.

**BUG/Suggest submission**

During the test, you may encounter various game bugs or deficiencies. We hope that users can actively participate and put forward your questions and ideas to help us better improve DeHeroGame!

submission address: <https://forms.gle/8XVMBRUcjLApWXLy9>

**About DeHeroGame**

DeHeroGame is a blockchain game published by MixMarvel with a global heroic fight as the background, and it was first released on RangersProtocol. Rich hero development and combination of professions and skills, train different heroes from various parallel worlds. Reasonably allocate different heroes to challenge nearly a hundred dungeon levels of different difficulty, and start an adventure in a different world.

title: a protocol that can support shared pending orders
body:
The decentralized NFT trading protocol is to NFT Market what AMM is to DEX.

The core needs in NFT trading are liquidity and price, so the real moat of NFT exchanges should be built on the liquidity and price advantage of commodities when they are sold.

The aggregator that changes the pattern only solves the problem of scattered NFT pending orders as a front-end traffic portal, and does not fundamentally solve the liquidity problem.

The most likely solution to the liquidity monopoly is not the next exchange or aggregator, but a protocol that can support shared pending orders, thereby breaking the boundaries between NFT tool platforms and NFT exchanges, so that every traffic front end can become a trading platform And share its pending orders to form a decentralized NFT trading ecosystem, and solve the problems of dispersion and liquidity of NFT pending orders.

title: Microsoft Releases Fix for Zero-Day Flaw in July 2022 Security Patch Rollout
body:
Microsoft released its monthly round of Patch Tuesday updates to address [84 new security flaws](https://msrc.microsoft.com/update-guide/releaseNote/2022-Jul) spanning multiple product categories, counting a zero-day vulnerability that's under active attack in the wild.

Of the 84 shortcomings, four are rated Critical, and 80 are rated Important in severity. Also separately resolved by the tech giant are [two other bugs](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/deployedge/microsoft-edge-relnotes-security) in the Chromium-based Edge browser, one of which plugs another [zero-day flaw](https://thehackernews.com/2022/07/update-google-chrome-browser-to-patch.html) that Google disclosed as being actively exploited in real-world attacks.

Top of the list of this month's updates is [CVE-2022-22047](https://msrc.microsoft.com/update-guide/vulnerability/CVE-2022-22047) (CVSS score: 7.8), a case of privilege escalation in the Windows Client Server Runtime Subsystem ([CSRSS](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Client/Server_Runtime_Subsystem)) that could be abused by an attacker to gain SYSTEM permissions.

"With this level of access, the attackers are able to disable local services such as Endpoint Detection and Security tools," Kev Breen, director of cyber threat research at Immersive Labs, told The Hacker News. "With SYSTEM access they can also deploy tools like Mimikatz which can be used to recover even more admin and domain level accounts, spreading the threat quickly."

Very little is known about the nature and scale of the attacks other than an "Exploitation Detected" assessment from Microsoft. The company's Threat Intelligence Center (MSTIC) and Security Response Center (MSRC) have been credited with reporting the flaw.

title: How to create mail3
body:
First what is mail3 : Mail3 is decentralized email  
  
 1. What are the advantages of mail3: 
 - You don't need to create a password here 
 - You can separate your important emails and emails about your web3 journey here 
 I think it's important for those of you who like to fill out forms and give your email. and it just satisfies the content of your email.. make it easy for you to view and sort emails about your web3 journey here.. so that your main email is not filled with spam or unimportant emails 
  
 All you need to use mail3 is ENS.. Why is that?  
 Because the mail3 team does not have enough resources and overcomes sybil attacks 
  
 2. Continue to the tutorial :  
 - Go TO : [https://app.mail3.me](https://app.mail3.me/) 
 - Connect your wallet  
 - Check wallet  
 - Confirm Signture 
 Congrats you succesfully signup on mail3 
 

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/itAl2C64-iVg0qMHt4Mpv.png?height=1080&width=1920)

 Q&A 
 - If you have several ENS, the first ENS will be used as your username 
 - ENS consists only of english alfabeth. can not use other alfabeths, emoticons

## 3. How to write email on mail3

\- Go to the main page. you can see the write button, click that button 
 

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/PR03KEwaGyWyEdU-b_VVm.png?height=1080&width=1920)

\- Then you just need to fill in what email you want to send  
 for example you can email me 
  
 To : mrlotta.eth@mail3.me  
 Subject : Example 
 Message : Exapmple 
 

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/RQzyahuE3oGMBqhsm5ajW.png?height=1080&width=1920)

 
 If you have a question about mail3 you can ask the team on discord 
 Come and join to the Community 
  
 - [Discord](https://discord.gg/hACgcS5Xq9) 

[https://discord.gg/hACgcS5Xq9](https://discord.gg/hACgcS5Xq9)

\- [Twitter](https://twitter.com/mail3dao) 
 

[https://twitter.com/mail3dao?s=20&t=oQG6_O45tuUSkW31tRemog](https://twitter.com/mail3dao?s=20&t=oQG6_O45tuUSkW31tRemog)

title: Stung By Wasp
body:
A lady golfer is stung by a **wasp**

Â 

She goes to look for the greenkeeper and finds him.

Â 

"I've been stung by a wasp," she says.

Â 

"Where did it get you?"

Â 

He replies, "Between the 1st and 2nd hole."

Â 

"I think your stance must be a little too wide"

title: How to create mail3
body:
First what is mail3 : Mail3 is decentralized email

1. What are the advantages of mail3:

* You don't need to create a password here
* You can separate your important emails and emails about your web3 journey here
  I think it's important for those of you who like to fill out forms and give your email. and it just satisfies the content of your email.. make it easy for you to view and sort emails about your web3 journey here.. so that your main email is not filled with spam or unimportant emails

All you need to use mail3 is ENS.. Why is that?Because the mail3 team does not have enough resources and overcomes sybil attacks

2\. Continue to the tutorial :

* Go TO : [https://app.mail3.me](https://app.mail3.me/)
* Connect your wallet
* Check wallet
* Confirm Signture
  Congrats you succesfully signup on mail3

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/itAl2C64-iVg0qMHt4Mpv.png?height=1080&width=1920)

Q&A

* If you have several ENS, the first ENS will be used as your username
* ENS consists only of english alfabeth. can not use other alfabeths, emoticons

## 3. How to write email on mail3

\- Go to the main page. you can see the write button, click that button

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/PR03KEwaGyWyEdU-b_VVm.png?height=1080&width=1920)

\- Then you just need to fill in what email you want to sendfor example you can email me

To : mrlotta.eth@mail3.me

Subject : Example
Message : Exapmple

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/RQzyahuE3oGMBqhsm5ajW.png?height=1080&width=1920)

If you have a question about mail3 you can ask the team on discord
Come and join to the Community

* [Discord](https://discord.gg/hACgcS5Xq9)

[https://discord.gg/hACgcS5Xq9](https://discord.gg/hACgcS5Xq9)

\- [Twitter](https://twitter.com/mail3dao)

[https://twitter.com/mail3dao?s=20&t=oQG6_O45tuUSkW31tRemog](https://twitter.com/mail3dao?s=20&t=oQG6_O45tuUSkW31tRemog)

title: Stung By Wasp
body:
A lady golfer is stung by a **wasp**

Â 

She goes to look for the greenkeeper and finds him.

Â 

"I've been stung by a wasp," she says.

Â 

"Where did it get you?"

Â 

He replies, "Between the 1st and 2nd hole."

Â 

"I think your stance must be a little too wide"

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/PR03KEwaGyWyEdU-b_VVm.png?height=1080&width=1920)

\- Then you just need to fill in what email you want to sendfor example you can email me

To : mrlotta.eth@mail3.me

Subject : Example
Message : Exapmple

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/RQzyahuE3oGMBqhsm5ajW.png?height=1080&width=1920)

If you have a question about mail3 you can ask the team on discord

title: DeHeroGame will start the TT (Technical Test) on July 14
body:
DeHeroGame will be run  TT (Technical Test) on the RangersProtocol mainnet from July 14th to July 28th.

Before you experience the new gameplay, please take a few minutes to get an overview of what this TT is about:

**About DeHeroGame TT content**

1\. The Technical Test will start at 16:00 on July 14th, 2022 (UTC+8); Test address: <https://rp.dehero.co/>

2\. This test will use the UNIPASS account system, please click here to [view the UNIPASS related introduction](https://mixmarvel.gitbook.io/dehero_game/v/en/)

3\. This Technical Test is a Wipe test. All related assets in the account will be wiped after the test, but the account will be retained. You can use this account to participate in the next test.

4ã€Players can receive the gift package via the address>><https://airdrop.dehero.co/>

![Gift Package](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/dsphhzVOmACp2s7Yf2Czt.png?height=586&width=784)

**Technical Test  content**

1\.Access to Unipass's account system to fully open up the access channel for web2.0 users;

2\.Hero level cap opened to level 90;

3\.The PVE adventure opens to chapter 9;

4\.Added multiple quick battle functions;

5\.Added batch payment to open treasure chest function;

6\.Added shortcut operations such as batch removal skills;

7\.According to user feedback, some problems have been fixed and optimized.

**Technical Test  Event**

During the test period, upgrade cards to meet the following conditions, you can get airdrop rewards when the main network is officially launched.

Event time: July 14th - July 28th

Activity content: During the test period, have 5 or more cards and reach the following levels:

5 or more cards with level 30 - blue game card pack\**1*

5 or more cards with level 40 - purple game card pack\*1

5 or more cards with level 60 - orange game card pack\*1

Tips: Event rewards will be distributed uniformly when the mainnet is officially launched.

**BUG/Suggest submission**

During the test, you may encounter various game bugs or deficiencies. We hope that users can actively participate and put forward your questions and ideas to help us better improve DeHeroGame!

submission address: <https://forms.gle/8XVMBRUcjLApWXLy9>

**About DeHeroGame**

DeHeroGame is a blockchain game published by MixMarvel with a global heroic fight as the background, and it was first released on RangersProtocol. Rich hero development and combination of professions and skills, train different heroes from various parallel worlds. Reasonably allocate different heroes to challenge nearly a hundred dungeon levels of different difficulty, and start an adventure in a different world.

title: decentralized web.
body:
This is why Sepana has taken on the challenge of radically improving search and discovery for web3. We believe that a simple, powerful, and intuitive search is critical for unleashing the full promise of the decentralized web.

In addition to AskMirror, we recently launched [cloutavista.com](https://cloutavista.com/), an advanced search experience for [BitClout](https://bitclout.com/), and the [DeSo](http://deso.org/) protocol. Cloutavista is the embedded search engine for BitClout.com, Diamondapp, and other DeSo projects.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/nkMevTy-15DnEQU-NtODh.jpg?height=1080&width=1920)

We're looking for fellow adventurers, curious minds, and passionate tinkerers to help build a better way to navigate web3. Ping me at [daniel@sepana.io](http://mailto:daniel@sepana.io/) if you're interested in joining the journey.

title: LFDAO
body:
Investment, network & education based DAO with family principles. Our mission is to create ecosystems that bring coordination & empowerment for our members.

We are built from a diverse & enriched network of professionals of many sectors including: entrepreneurs, musicians, developers/engineers, athletes, entertainers, curators, investors, educators and the list goes on.

We have 3 sectors in our DAO: Investments, Network & Education allowing members from many different expertises on board and find a familia in the web3 space.

To find out more about us on:

youtube:Â <https://youtube.com/channel/UCk-TsBuXF7CE3ykIdnVcfBg>

twitter:Â <https://twitter.com/lafamiliadao>

instagram:Â <https://instagram.com/lafamilia.dao>

telegram:Â <https://t.me/+hev93l5-3NdkM2Yx>

White paper will out by July 31st.

First Town Hall Meeting July 31st. Official Launch: September 1st.

Our plan is to create decentralize ecosystems that will empower our members in the virtual and real life world. 
  
 **Our mission is to create ecosystems, not brands.**
